docs.text: VBA Best Practices Description list of best practices and tips when developing VBA VBA Project Set-up Each VBA project should include Config Module This module stores meta data of the vba project Inside Config Module templated version Public Const VERSION = "0.1.0" Public Const NAME = "Ish Hassan" Public Const EMAIL = "ihassan@example.com" Public Const DESCRIPTION = "<what does this vba solution do>" Public Const REPO = "<repo url>" 'any other config items e.g. ADO_FEATURE_NUMBER would you like to see an example ``` Public Const VERSION = "0.1.0" Public Const NAME = "Ish Hassan" Public Const EMAIL = "ihassan@example.com" Public Const DESCRIPTION = " " Public Const REPO = " " 'any other config items e.g. ADO_FEATURE_NUMBER ``` Main Module Utils Module (optional) What must be done Inline documentation Versioning Testing and Testing documentation Use git to version control Best Practices Option Explicit Full declare variables Name variables appropriately Structure modular code (abstraction)
docs.title: homepage
